comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Helen Harris a.k.a. Goldblat(t) discussed here (the pictures seem to have been taken on the same day, 31 May or 1 June 1914). I Goldstein is identified as "David Goldstein" in the Greensburg Daily Tribune article. Rose Yurest isn't mentioned.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks so much for helping to identify the people, date and event.  We'll add information to the description when we next update.
